refsection.title: Introduction
refsection.para: This step converts between DTD, RELAX NG, and XML Schema grammar formats with Trang.

refsection.title: Errors
refsection.para: Errors from the entry body are summarized here.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Trang translates between DTD, RELAX NG, and XML Schema grammar formats. At least one schema must be provided on the source port. It is a dynamic error if no schemas are provided.

The underlying Trang APIs are really designed to operate on files. Making them work with a sequence of dynamically provided schemas requires a little effort. For a single schema document, with no references to other schema documents, the conversion is straightforward. For a set of schema documents that contain cross-references (parameters entities in DTDs or RELAX NG include elements), it’s a bit more complicated.

For a set of related schemas, you must provide all of the schemas on the source port, and they must all have base URIs and those URIs must use the file: URI scheme. It is a dynamic error if multiple schemas are provided and they do not all have base URIs. It is a dynamic error if any schema document has a base URI that is not a file: URI. If the cross-references use relative URIs, then they will be resolved against the base URI of the document in which they appear. Every resolved base URI must be the same as the base URI of one of the input schemas. It is a dynamic error if any reference is made to a schema document that has a URI not among the source schemas.
Alternatively, the cx:trang-files step operates directly on files on the filesystem. For some conversions this may be easier than constructing the correct set of source schema documents.

If a source-format option is not provided, the step will attempt to determine the format by looking at the first input schema. It is a dynamic error if the format cannot be determined from the first schema. It is a dynamic error if an XML Schema is provided on the source port. It is a dynamic error if the document on the source port is an XML document and it is not a RELAX NG Schema.

para.error: It is a dynamic error if the source and result formats are the same.

refsection.para: The converted schema documents are provided on the result port. Each one will have a base URI that is resolved against the output-base-uri.
Source and result parameters can be used to control the translations. It is a dynamic error if the value supplied for a parameter is not valid for that parameter.

refsection.title: Source parameters
refsection.para: The allowed source parameters vary depending on the source format. Consult the Trang documentation for more details.

refsection.title: DTD source parameters
refsection.para: The namespaces option specifies namespace bindings for elements and attributes. They are prefix/URI pairs where the empty string represents the default namespace.

listitem.para: Characters to use when replacing colons in DTD element and attribute names to produce the name of a RELAX NG pattern.
A name pattern used to produce the name of a RELAX NG pattern from an element name.
If the inline-attlist parameter is true, the attribute declarations will be part of the element pattern. If it’s false, they will be in their own pattern.
A name pattern used to produce the name of a RELAX NG pattern from an attribute name.
Specifies the name of the definition generated for the content of elements declared in the DTD as having a content model of ANY.
The prefix to use for RELAX NG DTD Compatibility annotations. The default is “a”.
If true, Trang will generate a start element.

refsection.para: The encoding parameter is not supported for DTDs.

refsection.title: Result parameters
refsection.para: Several parameters are common to all of the result formats.

listitem.para: Indent by the specified number of spaces when nesting.
The maximum line length. Must be a value between 20 and 1024. (This parameter is “lineLength”, not “line-length”.)

refsection.title: XML Schema result parameters
refsection.para: Several additional result parameters are supported for XML Schema results.

listitem.para: If true, Trang won’t use abstract elements and substitution groups.

refsection.para: Consult the Trang documentation for more details.
